Drawing Method

There must be a drawing method. The draw() method will use the Java method: 

 
drawOval(int x, int Y, int width, int height)

The method must be told on which drawing area to draw a circle, so the draw method has a single parameter for the Graphics object of the applet. 

class Circle
{
  // variables
  int x, y, radius;

  // constructors
  public Circle()
  { 
    x = 0; y = 0; radius = 0; 
  }

  public Circle( int x, int y, int radius )
  { 
    this.x = x;  this.y = y;  this.radius = radius; 
  }

  // methods
  draw( Graphics gr )
  {

    int ulX = _________________________ ; // X of upper left corner of rectangle


    int ulY = _________________________ ; // Y of upper left corner of rectangle

    gr.drawOval( ulX, ulY, _________________, _________________ );
  }

}
